Key Arguments: The submission argues against giving any government body the power to regulate speech.
It emphasizes the importance of freedom of speech as a foundational value of the country.
The submission suggests that more free speech is needed, not less.
Notable Quotes: Please leave free speech alone and do not incorporate or give power to any government body to regulate what it deems to be 'correct' or 'safe' speech through electronic platforms or otherwise.
We live in a beautiful country that is built on the value of freedom of speech - we need more free speech, not less.
